mapper.select: select history_id as historyId, amount, category, payment_method as paymentMethod, outlay_datetime as outlayDatetime, source, user_id as userId from MONEYHISTORY where user_id = #{userId};
mapper.insert: insert into MONEYHISTORY (amount, category, payment_method, outlay_datetime, source, user_id) value(#{amount}, #{category}, #{paymentMethod}, #{outlayDatetime}, #{source}, #{userId});
